text: Enter the Matrix is a 2003 action-adventure video game based on The Matrix and its sequels. It was written and directed by The Wachowskis. It notably has an hour of movie footage made just for the game with the actors intact. ==Plot== Niobe and Ghost are sent into the Matrix and retrieve a message found in a package. title: Enter the Matrix
